# News Release Detail

## 

Credo to Present at Barclays 22nd Annual Global Technology Conference

November 25, 2024 at 9:00 AM EST

[PDF Version](/node/10301/pdf)

SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 25, 2024-- Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (Credo) (NASDAQ: CRDO), an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved energy efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase throughout the data infrastructure market, today announced that Bill Brennan, President and CEO, and Dan Fleming, CFO, are scheduled to present at the following upcoming investor conference.

Conference: Barclays 22nd Annual Global Technology Conference

Date: Wednesday, December 11, 2024

Time: 2:30 p.m. PT

Location: San Francisco, California

The presentation will be webcast live on Credo’s IR website at [http://investors.credosemi.com/](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Finvestors.credosemi.com%2F&esheet=54157468&newsitemid=20241125338593&lan=en-US&anchor=http%3A%2F%2Finvestors.credosemi.com%2F&index=1&md5=2aff335e7955be4627ce63c588426438). The webcast replay will be available as soon as possible following the event on Credo’s IR website.

**About Credo**

Our mission is to deliver high-speed solutions to break bandwidth barriers on every wired connection in the data infrastructure market. Credo is an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved power efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase exponentially throughout the data infrastructure market. Our innovations ease system bandwidth bottlenecks while simultaneously improving on power, security, and reliability. Our connectivity solutions are optimized for optical and electrical Ethernet applications, including the emerging 100G (or Gigabits per second), 200G, 400G, 800G and the emerging 1.6T (or Terabits per second) port markets. Credo products are based on our proprietary Serializer/Deserializer (SerDes) and Digital Signal Processor (DSP) technologies. Our product families include Integrated Circuits (ICs) for the optical and line card markets, Active Electrical Cables (AECs) and SerDes Chiplets. Our intellectual property (IP) solutions consist primarily of SerDes IP licensing.

For more information, please visit [https://www.credosemi.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com&esheet=54157468&newsitemid=20241125338593&lan=en-US&anchor=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com&index=2&md5=ce76d935fa6504c8bb6d601e12e9c159). Follow Credo on [LinkedIn](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fcredo-semiconductor%2F&esheet=54157468&newsitemid=20241125338593&lan=en-US&anchor=LinkedIn&index=3&md5=c787adee9d41f9bf9236b2871313202e).

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241125338593r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): [https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241125338593/en/](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241125338593/en/)

**Investor Contact:** Dan O’Neil dan.oneil@credosemi.com

**Media Contact:** Diane Vanasse diane.vanasse@credosemi.com

Source: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd

# News Release Detail

## 

Credo Releases 2024 Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Report

November 21, 2024 at 9:00 AM EST

[PDF Version](/node/10291/pdf)

SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 21, 2024-- [Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcredosemi.com%2F&esheet=54156268&newsitemid=20241121375970&lan=en-US&anchor=Credo+Technology+Group+Holding+Ltd&index=1&md5=12b67cb4418c3fc3f9cb32fe3b095802) (Credo) (NASDAQ: CRDO) an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved energy efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase throughout the data infrastructure market, has released its 2024 Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Report. This report outlines Credo’s continued dedication to environmental stewardship, diversity and inclusion, and ethical governance.

This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241121375970/en/>

![This year, Credo expands on its ESG efforts, particularly around Greenhouse Gas \(GHG\) emissions measurement protocols, community engagement, and initiatives to foster an inclusive, supportive workplace. \(Graphic: Business Wire\)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20241121375970/en/2312393/4/Credo-ESG-2024-Report-PRimage-2400x1260.jpg)

This year, Credo expands on its ESG efforts, particularly around Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions measurement protocols, community engagement, and initiatives to foster an inclusive, supportive workplace. (Graphic: Business Wire)

Since its inception, Credo has been guided by principles of integrity, accountability, and a dedication to making a positive impact. The 2024 ESG report reflects this foundation, highlighting new advancements in environmental management, supply chain transparency, and employee empowerment programs. This year, Credo expands on its ESG efforts, particularly around Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions measurement protocols, community engagement, and initiatives to foster an inclusive, supportive workplace.

“Incorporating ESG into our business isn’t just about compliance; it’s about building a future that aligns with our values of responsibility, transparency, and accountability. Our ESG journey reflects our belief that Credo can, and should, be a force for positive change,” said Bill Brennan, President & CEO of Credo.

At Credo, our commitment to responsible growth and social impact goes hand-in-hand with delivering industry-leading technology with improved energy efficiency, thereby providing an opportunity for customers to reduce their environmental footprints. Our 2024 ESG Report highlights our progress related to ESG while laying out our vision for continuous improvement in this space. Credo’s ESG journey is a testament to the hard work and dedication of our employees, who bring our vision to life through their expertise, passion, and drive to make a difference.

To view Credo’s full 2024 ESG Report and learn more about the company’s sustainability initiatives, visit [Credo’s ESG page](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcredosemi.com%2Fesg%2F&esheet=54156268&newsitemid=20241121375970&lan=en-US&anchor=Credo%26%238217%3Bs+ESG+page&index=2&md5=f41a0793f0efcb4696a9c8b1eedb422a).

**About Credo**

Our mission is to deliver high-speed solutions to break bandwidth barriers on every wired connection in the data infrastructure market. Credo is an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved power efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase exponentially throughout the data infrastructure market. Our innovations ease system bandwidth bottlenecks while simultaneously improving on power, security, and reliability. Our connectivity solutions are optimized for optical and electrical Ethernet applications, including the emerging 100G (or Gigabits per second), 200G, 400G and 800G port markets. Our products are based on our proprietary Serializer/Deserializer (SerDes) and Digital Signal Processor (DSP) technologies. Our product families include integrated circuits (ICs), Active Electrical Cables (AECs) and SerDes chiplets. Our intellectual property (IP) solutions consist primarily of SerDes IP licensing.

For more information, please visit: [https://www.credosemi.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com%2F&esheet=54156268&newsitemid=20241121375970&lan=en-US&anchor=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com&index=3&md5=2a3c4e39e57fd34a1024ff51ed80b42e). Follow Credo on [LinkedIn](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fcredo-semiconductor%2F&esheet=54156268&newsitemid=20241121375970&lan=en-US&anchor=LinkedIn&index=4&md5=9e5c3fe3fe0a732b0537068d3165e784) and [Twitter](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fcredosemi&esheet=54156268&newsitemid=20241121375970&lan=en-US&anchor=Twitter&index=5&md5=1306a992a781a02f12a4794bb83b61cf).

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241121375970r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): [https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241121375970/en/](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241121375970/en/)

**Media Contact:** Diane Vanasse diane.vanasse@credosemi.com

**Investor Contact** : Dan O’Neil dan.oneil@credosemi.com

Source: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd

# News Release Detail

## 

Credo Completes First GHG Emissions Calculation, Strengthens Commitment to Environmental Sustainability

November 18, 2024 at 9:00 AM EST

[PDF Version](/node/10271/pdf)

SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 18, 2024-- [Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcredosemi.com%2F&esheet=54153919&newsitemid=20241118346647&lan=en-US&anchor=Credo+Technology+Group+Holding+Ltd&index=1&md5=17f345326b9018303d48555f2355ca13) (Credo) (NASDAQ: CRDO), an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved energy efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase throughout the data infrastructure market, is proud to announce the completion of its inaugural Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions and carbon footprint calculation for calendar year 2023. This comprehensive GHG report, created in collaboration with environmental consultancy [Minimum](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.minimum.com%2F&esheet=54153919&newsitemid=20241118346647&lan=en-US&anchor=Minimum&index=2&md5=c9a93a54659e920e8a241c02cd70f41f), marks a significant step forward in the company’s journey towards improved environmental sustainability.

This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241118346647/en/>

![This comprehensive GHG report, created in collaboration with environmental consultancy Minimum, marks a significant step forward in the company’s journey towards improved environmental sustainability. \(Graphic: Credo\)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20241118346647/en/2307426/4/Credo-MinimumReport-PRimage-2400x1260.jpg)

This comprehensive GHG report, created in collaboration with environmental consultancy Minimum, marks a significant step forward in the company’s journey towards improved environmental sustainability. (Graphic: Credo)

Targeting direct office emissions as well as indirect emissions from purchased electricity and heating, the report calculation concentrated on Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions. Credo acknowledges the environmental issues facing the semiconductor sector, especially with relation to energy-intensive procedures. To read about our scope 1 and 2 emissions, visit here: [**2024 Credo GHG Report**](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcredosemi.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F11%2FCredo-GHG-Report-2024.pdf&esheet=54153919&newsitemid=20241118346647&lan=en-US&anchor=2024+Credo+GHG+Report&index=3&md5=bc494734e3187f99aeb57af8bd3e4ae9)

“This year has been pivotal in laying the groundwork to understand and reduce our environmental footprint,” said Bill Brennan, CEO of Credo. “Our high-performance connectivity solutions are optimized for low power, enhancing energy efficiency in data centers around the world. Alongside these innovations, we’ve transitioned our San Jose facilities to 100% renewable energy sources. Now, with this emissions baseline, we can collaborate more effectively with industry partners to develop a comprehensive carbon offset strategy.”

By setting these sustainability goals and leading by example, Credo encourages other industry leaders to join the effort toward a sustainable future. Additional details on Credo’s sustainability initiatives and GHG reporting plans will be shared in its upcoming Environmental Social Governance (ESG) report.

**About Credo**

Our mission is to deliver high-speed solutions to break bandwidth barriers on every wired connection in the data infrastructure market. Credo is an innovator in providing secure, high-speed connectivity solutions that deliver improved power efficiency as data rates and corresponding bandwidth requirements increase exponentially throughout the data infrastructure market. Our innovations ease system bandwidth bottlenecks while simultaneously improving on power, security, and reliability. Our connectivity solutions are optimized for optical and electrical Ethernet applications, including the emerging 100G (or Gigabits per second), 200G, 400G, 800G and the emerging 1.6T (or Terabits per second) port markets. Credo products are based on our proprietary Serializer/Deserializer (SerDes) and Digital Signal Processor (DSP) technologies. Our product families include Integrated Circuits (ICs) for the optical and line card markets, Active Electrical Cables (AECs) and SerDes Chiplets. Our intellectual property (IP) solutions consist primarily of SerDes IP licensing.

For more information, please visit [https://www.credosemi.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com%2F&esheet=54153919&newsitemid=20241118346647&lan=en-US&anchor=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.credosemi.com&index=4&md5=a5c1097722ebf7c1bb7576f40df0b1c6). Follow Credo on [LinkedIn](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fcredo-semiconductor%2Fposts%2F%3FfeedView%3Dall&esheet=54153919&newsitemid=20241118346647&lan=en-US&anchor=LinkedIn&index=5&md5=ad3cfc0e282a2e246f8b6b9b5238c70b).

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241118346647r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)
